entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: 地城謎蹤
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$90.00 → $60.00 [$60.00 ~ $90.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$60.00

应用描述

-- 獲獎： ● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選 ● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎 ● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞 關於此遊戲： 《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。 此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。 而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。 遊戲特色： ● 地城+解謎+倉庫番 ● 150 個精心設計的關卡 ● 地城氛圍的像素美術 ● 非線性地城地圖 -- ● 在 Twitter 上追蹤我們 https://twitter.com/nekolyst ● 在 Facebook 上幫我們點讚 https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ● 加入我們的 Discord 群組 https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 照片橡皮擦
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$60.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $60.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

Photo Eraser易於刪除圖像中不需要的對像如刪除水印，日期戳，額外的文字，建築等等並保持原有的重要視覺效果不發生改變。   您只需以紅色去標記不需要的區域，Photo Eraser會在一分鐘內美化你的照片。   產品特點：  √ 刪除不需要的對象。  √ 從照片中刪除人。  √ 刪除文字，簽名等。  √ 讓肌膚瑕疵消失。  √ 完全非技術性的軟件，非常易用。    反饋： 任何建議將不勝感激，技術支持郵件Market@effectmatrix.com

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: Doodle Baseball Game
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$90.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $150.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

应用截屏

iPad

entry.title: FocusDots · 專注於當下
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$60.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $60.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

感謝您使用FocusDots！這是一個簡單的時間管理應用，將提高您的工作效率。 有時候，保持注意力集中在任務上可能並不容易。FocusDots是一個精美設計的計時器，旨在提高您對任務的專注，並丟棄可能分散注意力的活動。 FocusDots是一個簡單的時間管理應用，包含四個簡單的步驟： 1) 決定要完成的單個任務。 2) 啟動FocusDots並在計時器結束前（25分鐘）專注於該任務。 3) 休息一下（5分鐘）。 4) 完成四個Dots後，休息更長時間（15分鐘）。 特點： - 優雅的極簡設計 - 每日總結 - 精美設計主題 - 激勵引用語 - 可為您的任務自定義計時器時長 感謝您選擇FocusDots！我們由衷感謝您的支持，希望我們的應用能幫助您提高生產力和時間管理技巧。如果您有任何反饋或建議，我們非常樂意聽取！

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Speech to Text : Voice to Text
entry.id: Speech to Text : Voice to Text-tw-1758025448754
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$60.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $60.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買

  • Month：$50.00
  • Year：$390.00
  • 6 Months：$150.00

应用描述

Speech to text : Voice to text is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content. Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words! Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.) Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today! This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad : ・Longer Record time: -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR. ・Unlimited save & edits ・Transcribed text can be edited directly. ・Ideal for both individual and group transcription ・Background support for voice recognition. ・On-device Speech Recognition. • Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents. • Share your text on social networks. • Copy your text to other apps. • Send your text as an email or text message. • Create PDF instantly with single click. • Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly • Text Analysis using AI. ► Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, Bokmål, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. Technology: New iOS 14 Speech framework having state of the art accuracy, Faster ,Automatically adapts to the user Super easy: Simply click the microphone and start dictating. No need to login or register You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands. Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ? 1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio. 2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere. 3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen! 4. Elderly or Disabled: Eliminates slow typing, commonly misspelled words or embarrassing composition mistakes. This app makes it convenient and easy to send and share your words with those you love. 5. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app ! SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS We offer three auto-renewing subscription options: $1.99 / month $9.49 / 6 months - Save 20% $14.49 / 1 year - Save 40% The price corresponds to the same price segment , which are set in the “Apple App Store Matrix” for other currencies You can cancel a subscription anytime by turning off auto renewal though your iTunes account settings.This must be done 24 hours before the end of subscription period to avoid being charged. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription. Terms of Service : https://voiceovermaker.com/termsofuse Privacy Policy: https://voiceovermaker.com/privacypolicy Support: Please email for any suggestions/feedback voiceovermakerz@gmail.com

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MagicKit Pro：AI智慧工具箱
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$90.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $120.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱 MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。 裝置與系統工具： • 電池狀態：查看目前電量與充電情況 • 儲存空間使用：分析已用與可用空間 • 裝置資訊：查看基本硬體與系統資訊 • 開機時間追蹤：監控裝置開機持續時間 • 電池小貼士：提供實用省電建議 • 相片清理：偵測與刪除重複或相似相片釋放空間 網路工具： • 網速測試：測量網路連線速度 • Wi-Fi 資訊：查看網路名稱、IP 位址與連線狀態 • IP 查詢：查看公網 IP 的地理位置資訊 實用工具： • 單位換算器：支援各類單位轉換 • 貨幣換算器：即時匯率與幣值轉換 • 日期時間計算器：支援工作日計算的日期差異 • 時區轉換器：全球時間轉換，支援夏令時間顯示 • 倒數計時與提醒：建立美觀倒數計時，支援提醒與重複事件 • Magic 計數器：追蹤多個計數器，提供統計與連續天數 • QR 掃描器：快速掃描二維碼 • 文件掃描器：高品質掃描與儲存文件 • 指南針與水平儀：使用裝置感應器測量方向與水平 • 螢幕方向鎖定：於應用內鎖定螢幕方向 • 音量測量儀：透過麥克風測量環境音量 • 剪貼簿管理器：管理當前應用中的複製內容 • 手電筒：開啟裝置手電筒照明 • 螢幕亮度調整：可於應用內直接調整亮度 特色亮點： • 簡潔直覺的導引式介面 • 無廣告、無內購 • 輕巧省電 • 支援所有 iOS 裝置 • 持續新增工具與更新 • 重視隱私與效能 適用族群： • 裝置監控與效能優化 • 日常測量與轉換任務 • 掃描文件與 QR 碼 • 相片清理與空間管理 • 倒數提醒與計劃管理 • 追蹤習慣與統計進度 • 快速使用工具如手電筒與亮度調整 • 執行簡易網路測試診斷 立即下載 MagicKit AI，使用一款智慧又強大的工具箱，簡化您的日常工作與生活！

entry.title: 60 Parsecs!
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$120.00 → $60.00 [$60.00 ~ $120.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$60.00

应用描述

Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age. Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN? This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets. Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive? Bon voyage! SCAVENGE & EVACUATE With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy. SURVIVE & DECIDE Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you. EXPLORE & CRAFT Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure. LEAD & PROTECT As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 60 Seconds! Reatomized
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$100.00 → $60.00 [$60.00 ~ $100.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$60.00

应用描述

Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content! NEW GAMEPLAY MODE Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test! NEW OPPORTUNITIES to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style? NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members! NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter! NEW ACHIEVEMENTS! With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind? Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland. Good luck.

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 籠中窺夢
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$150.00 → $120.00 [$120.00 ~ $150.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$120.00

应用描述

《籠中窺夢》是一款「視錯覺」解謎遊戲，由兩人工作室Optillusion開發完成。 遊戲的內容全部包含在一個神秘的立方體中，立方體的每個面都是一個獨立的世界：工廠，燈塔，遊樂園，教堂等等，他們之間看似毫不相關，實則交錯萬千，充滿了意想不到的關聯…… 【燒腦視錯覺解謎】 發揮你的腦洞與想象力，找到那些平凡場景與物體之間的聯系，產生意想不到的奇妙互動，拼接，然後見證奇跡誕生。 【收集照片拼湊故事】 謎題背後，遊戲還有一個等待著被玩家們發現並反轉的故事。通過收集照片拼湊故事，試著解開它隱藏的真相吧。 【多重提示杜絕卡關】 遊戲包含多種解謎引導機製，包括最基礎的「視覺引導」，幫助你快速定位關鍵物品；而「文字提示」則可以幫你整理解謎思路；最後還有「視頻提示」，用終極手段保證你絕不會卡關。 【拿下獎章證明實力】 遊戲擁有 15 個成就，每個成就都對應著一個根據劇情設計的獨特獎章。如果你是解謎遊戲達人，那就用這些獎章來證明自己吧~ 【聯系我們】 官方QQ討論群：626570283 官方微博：@心動網絡 、@籠中窺夢-Moncage 官方郵箱：moncagethegame@gmail.com

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: Day One Journal
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買

  • Premium：$1,090.00 → $190.00 [$190.00 ~ $1,090.00]

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買

  • Premium：$190.00

应用描述

Apple 年度最佳應用程式 Day One，全球下載次數超過 1,500 萬次，獲得 200,000 次 5 星評價，徹底改變了寫日記的方式，讓你記錄生活中的點點滴滴。 在全球最值得信賴的數位日記中安全地儲存音訊、影片、照片、筆記等其他內容。 「Day One 創造珍貴的回憶，近乎完美：完全隱密的數位空間。」 –《紐約時報》 「Day One 讓寫日記變得輕鬆愉快。」 – 《連線》 「這款優異的日記應用程式賞心悅目、簡單好用，讓競爭對手難以超越。」–《Macworld》 為什麼選擇 Day One？ Day One 是原創日記應用程式。十年來持續更新並增添功能，打造全球最隱密、最值得信賴，也最好用的日記平台。 簡單好用，讓人著迷 • 獲獎設計，美觀大方 • 無限文本條目 • 無限量照片和影片* •強大的 RTF 文字格式與 Markdown • 記錄生活點滴的全新方式* 私密又安全 • 自動備份，妥善保護日記條目 • 端對端加密，100% 確保日記隱密 •透過密碼或 TouchID 保障日記條目安全 •提供多種匯出選項 (pdf、純文字、JSON 等)，確保日記條目永遠歸你所有 養成並保持習慣 •可設定的提醒通知 • 每日不重覆的日記提示，消除你的撰寫障礙 •可自訂範本讓你省下時間，並讓版面看起來井井有條 • 今日檢視讓你快速查看今天去過哪些地方、做了哪些事 隨時隨地寫日記 • 跨平台應用程式，可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用 • 可透過電子郵件直接傳送條目到日記中 專為記錄回憶打造 • 「在這一天」功能讓你重溫過往回憶 • 標籤、我的最愛和搜尋篩選條件讓你輕鬆找到所需內容 • 「地圖檢視」讓你快速查看已記錄的所有地點 *Day One 是款提供使用者永久免費使用的應用程式，完全不限條目數量。 Day One Premium 會員另可享有無限量照片、影片及同步功能。 立即開始免費試用。 隱私權政策：https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/ 使用條款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/ 如需技術協助或有其他問題，請前往：https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

应用截屏

iPhone
